Headline.title: Uşak's Heritage, The Art of Leather
Headline.subTitle: The Quality Where Design Begins
Headline.rightText: We combine Uşak's deep-rooted leather tradition with modern craftsmanship. Each lambskin, processed by master hands, transforms into a unique canvas to bring designers' visions to life. We offer quality and heritage for your creativity.

Introduction.title: CINAR LEATHER - WHO ARE WE?
Introduction.text: At Cinar Leather, we reflect quality and craftsmanship in every piece, inspired by tradition and elevated through modern design. We don't just work with leather – we give it character, elegance, and a timeless presence. Each of our products is a unique harmony of mastery and simplicity.

whyCinarSection.headline: Why should I choose Çınar Leather?
whyCinarSection.subHeadline: We adhere to three core principles: high performance, reliability, and innovation.
whyCinarSection.decription1: At Çınar Leather, we adhere to quality standards at every stage and ensure your projects are implemented safely.
whyCinarSection.decription2: We operate with maximum efficiency in our production and service processes and provide quick solutions to your needs.
whyCinarSection.decription3: We closely follow the latest trends and technologies in the leather industry and develop modern solutions.
whyCinarSection.decription4: We prioritize customer satisfaction and provide professional support that is always accessible.

GalleryItem.aciklama: Images from Çınar Leather's production process with our modern machinery and experienced team.

Footer.slogan: Art in Every Touch, Quality in Every Layer.

Contact.title: Our Contact Channels
Contact.description: We’re here to discuss your project, answer questions, or schedule a free discovery meeting.
Contact.emailHintText: For detailed information and quote requests.

About.heading: About Us
About.subheading: Discover the story and craftsmanship of the Çınar Leather family.
About.aboutText: Çınar Leather is a family business that masterfully works the finest cowhides with years of experience and a modern design approach. Every product reflects our meticulous craftsmanship, ensuring top customer satisfaction. From day one to today, we've become a trusted brand in the industry through innovative solutions and sustainable processes.
About.missionText: At Çınar Leather, our mission is to enhance our customers’ quality of life by offering aesthetically and functionally superior, high-quality, and sustainable leather products.
About.visionText: Our vision is to make Çınar Leather a globally recognized, leading leather brand known for innovative design and quality.
About.valuesText: Guided by principles of integrity, craftsmanship, innovation, and sustainability in every step we take.
About.coreValuesHeading: The Foundation of Our Work: Our Values
About.coreValuesSubheading: The fundamental principles that guide every decision and action we take.
About.card1Text: Our customers are at the heart of every project. We focus on your needs and deliver solutions that exceed expectations.
About.card2Text: We never compromise on material selection or workmanship, delivering durable and aesthetically pleasing products.
About.card3Text: We build trust through transparent communication and an honest approach in all our processes.
About.card4Text: We stay abreast of industry trends and new materials to create functional and contemporary designs.
About.card5Text: Our experienced team provides high-standard service from project management to execution.
About.card6Text: We adhere to scheduled timelines to deliver your projects flawlessly and on time.
About.card7Text: We approach every challenge with proactive and creative solutions.
About.card8Text: We add value to the future with eco-friendly material choices and energy-efficient processes.

posts.title: How to Choose Leather?

Services.mainTitle: Welcome to Çınar Leather’s proud heritage and the responsibility we carry into the future. Excellence and trust accompany you at every step.
Services.text1: We process hides sourced from Uşak and export them to global markets.
Services.text2: Carefully selected lamb skins guarantee quality and durability.
Services.text3: With transparent procedures and expert teams, we deliver a flawless experience from leather cutting to assembly.
Services.text4: We certify our products’ reliability with ISO certifications and our testing laboratory.
Services.text5: We adhere to ethical and legal standards through environmentally friendly production and respect for workers’ rights.
Services.text6: We offer the leathers produced in Uşak to global markets in wholesale, using our international logistics network for fast and reliable delivery.

MissionVision.mainTitle: Discover where we come from and where we aim to go at Çınar Leather.

SliderHeadline.text1: We process Uşak's most precious lamb leather with the master hands of Çınar Deri. Capture the perfect touch with us that will bring your designs to life.
SliderHeadline.text2: We transform each sheet of leather into a work of art with unique textures and colors. We are ready to be your source of inspiration for your collections.
SliderHeadline.text3: For the designs of your dreams, we offer custom leather solutions for your project with our rich color palette and special processing techniques.
SliderHeadline.text4: With our nature-respecting production approach, we process the highest quality leather with eco-friendly processes, leaving a responsible legacy for the future.

StoryTelling.text1: Çınar Leather brings together quality and care in leather products with a young and dynamic team. Each piece is designed and crafted with passion.
StoryTelling.text2: We combine traditional handcraftsmanship with modern design in our products. Every stitch and detail is made for quality and durability.
StoryTelling.text3: Elegance and functionality together; we create accessories that will be with you in every moment of your daily life.
StoryTelling.text4: Customer satisfaction and sustainable production are our priorities. We offer long-lasting products with eco-friendly materials.

hero.title: Çınar Leather Global Trade Hub
hero.description: From our logistics bases in Uşak, we seamlessly deliver our leather products to international markets.

hero.title: Step-by-Step Excellence in Leather Production
hero.description: At Çınar Leather’s factory, precision and transparency are paramount at every stage—from the finest raw materials to final assembly.

cta.title: Want to See Our Production Up Close?
cta.description: Explore every step from cutting to finishing with our expert team on a guided or virtual tour.

1.title: Raw Material Selection
1.description: Certified lamb hides are sorted by quality, thickness, and flexibility.
1.label: STEP 1

2.title: Cutting & Pre-Processing
2.description: Precision cutting machines ensure millimeter-perfect parts and surface preparation.

3.title: Tanning & Coloring
3.description: Vegetable tanning and hand-finishing deliver durable, vibrant hues.

4.title: Stitching & Assembly
4.description: Double-stitch techniques and precise assembly extend product lifespan.

5.title: Edge Finishing & Polishing
5.description: Edges are smoothed, sealed, and polished for lasting protection and sheen.
5.label: STEP 5

6.title: Quality Inspection
6.description: Each piece undergoes rigorous tests for color, consistency, and durability.

7.title: Packaging & Shipping
7.description: Careful packaging and fast logistics ensure your products arrive safely.
7.label: STEP 7

1.title: Automated Cutting Systems
1.description: High-precision CNC machines minimize material waste.

2.title: Eco-Friendly Tanning
2.description: Water-saving and biodegradable tanning solutions are employed.

3.title: Robotic Assembly Support
3.description: Robotic arms ensure consistent quality in critical assembly steps.

4.title: Smart Tracking & Traceability
4.description: A digital barcode system provides full transparency for each batch.

1.title: 99% Accuracy
1.description: Automated cutting reduced our error rate from 5% to 1%.

2.title: Green Tanning Success
2.description: Our new tanning line cut water usage by 40%.

3.title: Swift Order Fulfillment
3.description: Optimized workflows ensure on-time, complete deliveries.

4.description: Our engineers and craftsmen bring years of specialized experience.

hero.title: Lamb Hides Selected to the Highest Quality Standards
hero.description: At Çınar Leather, we use lamb hides carefully selected from certified suppliers, ensuring full traceability from raw material to finished product.

cta.title: Discover Our Sourcing Process
cta.description: Contact us to learn every step—from supplier selection to quality certifications.

1.title: Supplier Assessment
1.description: We carefully select farms and tanneries certified to international standards.
1.label: STEP 1

2.title: Raw Hide Selection
2.description: Hides undergo thorough physical inspection based on defect, thickness, and flexibility criteria.

3.title: Cleaning & Conservation
3.description: Pre-cleaning with natural salts and mild chemicals prepares the hide surface for processing.

4.title: Vegetable Tanning Prep
4.description: We achieve optimal extract concentration and pH levels for vegetable tanning solutions.

5.title: Storage & Dispatch
5.description: Hides are stored in climate-controlled facilities and packed for custom shipment.
5.label: STEP 5

1.title: Certified Sourcing
1.description: We provide veterinary health reports and environmental compliance documents for every batch.

2.title: Physical Testing Protocols
2.description: Flexibility, durability, and moisture-resistance tests measure each hide batch’s performance.

3.title: Color & Tone Consistency Checks
3.description: Pre- and post-tanning color consistency is verified with a spectrophotometer.

4.title: Sustainable Resource Management
4.description: Eco-friendly tanning chemicals and wastewater treatment systems help us maintain ecological balance.

1.title: Local Farm Partnerships
1.description: Sourcing hides directly from regional family farms brings local quality to a global scale.

2.title: International Standards
2.description: We enhance our diversity by working with certified suppliers from Europe and North America.

3.title: Green Tanning Initiative
3.description: Our vegetable tanning facility develops eco-friendly methods that save water and energy.

features.title: Key Features of Our Material Selection

1.title: Full Transparency
1.description: We guarantee traceability and documentation at every step of our supply chain.

2.title: Superior Physical Strength
2.description: Rigorous tests prove each hide’s flexibility and tear resistance.

3.title: Natural Color Consistency
3.description: Vegetable tanning delivers unique, vibrant hues in every batch.

4.title: Eco-Friendly Practices
4.description: We ensure sustainability with wastewater treatment and recyclable tanning agents.

hero.title: Our International Quality Standards & Certifications
hero.description: At Çınar Leather, we equip every product with certifications such as ISO, CE, TÜRKAK, and REACH—guaranteeing quality at every stage.

cta.title: Access Our Quality Documents
cta.description: Contact us for the full list of certifications and test reports, or request a digital copy.

1.title: Defining Quality Policy
1.description: We establish our quality policy based on customer expectations and legal requirements.
1.label: STEP 1

2.title: Documentation & Planning
2.description: We document all procedures in written protocols and clarify responsibilities.

3.title: Implementation & Training
3.description: We provide regular training to our staff and enforce quality standards on the floor.

4.title: Monitoring & Measurement
4.description: We continuously monitor production performance and analyze measurement results.

5.title: Corrective & Preventive Actions
5.description: We act immediately on non-conformities to improve our processes.
5.label: COMPLETED

1.title: Physical Durability Tests
1.description: We document leather performance with abrasion, tear, and flexibility tests.

2.title: Chemical Analyses
2.description: We conduct lab analyses to ensure compliance with REACH and heavy-metal limits.

3.title: Color & Tone Consistency
3.description: We verify batch-to-batch color uniformity using spectrophotometer measurements.

4.title: Environmental Compliance Audits
4.description: We control our environmental impact through wastewater and emission testing.

1.title: ISO 9001:2015 Certification
1.description: By certifying to the international quality standard, we have increased customer satisfaction.

2.title: CE Conformity Approval
2.description: CE marking guarantees the safety of our products for the European market.

3.title: TÜRKAK Accreditation
3.description: Our accredited laboratory testing provides full traceability.

1.title: International Standards
1.description: Guaranteed compliance with ISO, CE, REACH, and TÜRKAK certifications.

2.title: Transparent Reporting
2.description: We provide detailed test reports for every production batch.

3.title: In-House Laboratory
3.description: Our fully equipped lab conducts tests and inspections 24/7.

4.title: Continuous Improvement
4.description: We raise quality continuously through corrective actions and customer feedback.

hero.title: Full Transparency and Legal Assurance in Production
hero.description: At Çınar Leather, we conduct all our activities in full compliance with current regulations and within an ethical framework.

cta.title: Explore Our Compliance Policies
cta.description: Contact us for detailed information on our legal documents, certifications, and ethical principles.

1.description: We continuously monitor laws and industry regulations and prepare compliance plans tailored to our needs.
1.label: STEP 1

2.title: Risk Assessment
2.description: We identify potential legal and ethical risks in our supply and production chain and implement preventive measures.

3.title: Standardization & Documentation
3.description: We convert all processes into written procedures and maintain thorough records.

4.title: Training & Awareness
4.description: We regularly train our employees on legal and ethical matters to ensure full awareness.

5.title: Auditing & Reporting
5.description: Through internal and third-party audits, we verify compliance and prepare improvement reports.
5.label: COMPLETED

2.title: Environmental & Workplace Safety
2.description: From production chemicals to safety protocols, we manage all processes with environmental and human well-being in mind.

3.title: Data Privacy & Security
3.description: We protect customer and employee data in accordance with KVKK and GDPR requirements.

4.title: Social Responsibility
4.description: We share our ethical values with the community through social responsibility initiatives and volunteer programs.

2.title: Green Production Certification
